thread.title: Contemporary First Floor Condominum, Escazú, For Rent
thread.title_full: Contemporary First Floor Condominum, Escazú, For Rent -The Tico Times

author: Mariana
title: Contemporary First Floor Condominum, Escazú, For Rent
text:
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/25-20-05.jpg
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/25-20-02.jpg
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/25-20-01.jpg
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/25-20-03.jpg
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/25-20-04.jpg
Price: $3,600 Mensual Province: San José
Cantón: Escazú
Construction: 361m2
Bedrooms: 4
Bathrooms: 3
Parking: 3
A/C: Yes
This contemporary first floor condominium has four bedroom, three bathroom and is located in the heart of Escazú. This condo has a very spacious dinning room and living room and an open kitchen with granite counter-tops and contemporary wooden cabinetry. The master bedroom has 2 walk-in closets and a master bathroom with jacuzzi and double vanity. All bedrooms have spacious wooden closets and wooden floors. There are two large terraces with a jacuzzi and access to green areas. There are three underground parking spaces and two storage areas with a laundry room and maid’s quarters. The condominium is very tranquil and is surrounded by luscious green areas. The property also offers a gym and 24/7 surveillance.
COD: 25-20
Email: realestate@ticotimes.net
Phone: +(506) 2258-1558
